root.name: Zack Zero
root.description: Zack Zero is a 2D platforming game for the PC and PlayStation Network. The game's titular protagonist has the ability to transform into three different elemental forms: ice, fire, and stone. The gameplay combines hack and slash elements with the level exploration of a platformer.Evil Zulrog has captured Zack's beloved Marlene, but is willing to exchange for kelestinia, a mysterious material that has "the power to travel in time".System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7 or Windows 8Processor: 2.0Ghz Intel Core 2 Duo Processor or AMD equivalentMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: Nvidia 8600 GT 512 MB Video Card or AMD equivalentDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 4 GB HD spaceRecommendedOS: Windows 7 / Windows 8Processor: Any Quad-core Intel or AMD ProcessorMemory: 4 GB RAMGraphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 275 512MB Video Card or AMD equivalentDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 4 GB HD space
